detaileddescription.para:
Return with a pointer to the active screen
disp
pointer to display which active screen should be get. (NULL to use the default screen)
pointer to the active screen object (loaded by 'lv_scr_load()')

Return with a pointer to the previous screen. Only used during screen transitions.
disp
pointer to display which previous screen should be get. (NULL to use the default screen)
pointer to the previous screen object or NULL if not used now

Make a screen active
scr
pointer to a screen

Return with the top layer. (Same on every screen and it is above the normal screen layer)
disp
pointer to display which top layer should be get. (NULL to use the default screen)
pointer to the top layer object (transparent screen sized lv_obj)

Return with the sys. layer. (Same on every screen and it is above the normal screen and the top layer)
disp
pointer to display which sys. layer should be get. (NULL to use the default screen)
pointer to the sys layer object (transparent screen sized lv_obj)

Assign a screen to a display.
disp
pointer to a display where to assign the screen
scr
pointer to a screen object to assign

Set the background color of a display
disp
pointer to a display
color
color of the background

Set the background image of a display
disp
pointer to a display
img_src
path to file or pointer to an lv_img_dsc_t variable

Opacity of the background
disp
pointer to a display
opa
opacity (0..255)

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_obj_t *scr, lv_scr_load_anim_t anim_type, uint32_t time, uint32_t delay, bool auto_del)
memberdef.name: lv_scr_load_anim

detaileddescription.para:
Switch screen with animation
scr
pointer to the new screen to load
anim_type
type of the animation from lv_scr_load_anim_t. E.g. LV_SCR_LOAD_ANIM_MOVE_LEFT
time
time of the animation
delay
delay before the transition
auto_del
true: automatically delete the old screen

Get elapsed time since last user activity on a display (e.g. click)
disp
pointer to an display (NULL to get the overall smallest inactivity)
elapsed ticks (milliseconds) since the last activity

Manually trigger an activity on a display
disp
pointer to an display (NULL to use the default display)

Clean any CPU cache that is related to the display.
disp
pointer to an display (NULL to use the default display)

Get a pointer to the screen refresher task to modify its parameters with lv_task_... functions.
disp
pointer to a display
pointer to the display refresher task. (NULL on error)

Get the active screen of the default display
pointer to the active screen

Get the top layer of the default display
pointer to the top layer

Get the active screen of the default display
pointer to the sys layer
